name: Rundll32 Registered COM Objects
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\-[Ss][Tt][Aa]\ .*/ OR /.*\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:/.*\{.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\}.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.command_line:(*\-sta\ * OR *\-localserver\ *) AND process.command_line:*\{* AND process.command_line:*\}*)`
